posts.post_content:
Homemade solid oak card stands. Nice alternative to plastic. Unfinished and ready for choice of paint, stain, polyurethane. The slot is designed to hold a SGC, PSA or BCCG graded card. It's all about thickness of the holder. SGC cards stand nearly vertical w/ a slight tilt, PSA, BCCG with more tilt. 

10 for $30, shipped.
If you're not happy, return in 10 days and we'll refund your money. You pay return shipping. 
Checks, MOs & PayPal gift.

These look really great.  Was wondering if there'd be an option, to pay, for paint or stain to give them a finished look?
Thanks,
--S
I'll check with my brother-in-law, Gepetto. :)

Thanks to those of you who ordered stands. 
In addition to oak, 20 are now available in cedar. 

Gepetto has no plans to paint or stain, preferring unfinished.
Would be interested if Gepetto changes his mind about the paint/stain.

Hey folks,

Stands look awesome raw!! Love the work from Gepetto :D

Thanks John

Greg

Thanks for everyone's interest in these stands.

Some nice looking cedar stands are now available if anyone is interested.
10 for $30 shipped

This batch is for SGC holders or holders of similar thickness. We've learned that the slightest difference in the size of the slot makes quite a difference in the tilt of the card. Photo includes a PSA card, which I think tilts too far back.
Perhaps Gepetto could simply make a shim to insert into slot for other type holders? Wouldn't cost much and could make the holder almost universal. Just an idea.

Bump.
20 available in cedar and 20 made of oak.

Bump for clearance sale.

$2 each, shipped to US address. Check, MO or PP Gift.

Available only in oak. (see photos)

13 - PSA remaining
